item.title: Dotenv-vault, how to safely manage your envfiles in a collaborative environment
item.description: Bootstrapping a project When bootstrapping a project many tasks like executing and building it require some variable to be set. Those variables are usually stored inside a .env file and later supplied to those processes. Solving a security issue .env files usually contain private or sensitive data, such as API Keys and other pieces of information that should never go public. For this reason, .env files and application code are never shipped together, so we’ll need to pass .
